snippet: United Nations peacekeepers intervened in the attack, which also left five of the assailants dead and several other people wounded.
abstract: Muslim attackers kill eight civilians in Central African Republic refugee camp, days after Pope Francis, on visit to country, called for end to violence between Muslims and Christians.
lead_paragraph: United Nations peacekeepers intervened in the attack, which also left five of the assailants dead and several other people wounded.

headline.main: Central African Republic: Attack Kills 8 Civilians at Camp for Displaced People
headline.print_headline: Africa; Central African Republic: Attack Kills 8 Civilians at Camp for Displaced People
